comment.body: [@Styromaniac:](?Profile/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd/styromaniac@zeroid.bit "mention:16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd") I think it could be useful simple bridges like "[ZeroMe Mastodon/Gnusocial Bridge](/1EiMAqhd6sMjPG2tznkkGXxhdwFBDdeqT9/?Post:23)"; ZeroNet is too isolated

this trick don't work always: my two profiles (schiz0@kxoid.bit and fluss0@kaffie.bit) still remain unsynched on my different devices

these profiles are hosted on my personal hub and even if I update or check files on this hub nothing happen, they seem different independent profiles
